adventure_overview: Tigers will identify technology that is common in most homes and discover how technology has improved along with safety rules around technology they come in contact with . Prior to any activity, use Scouting America SAFE Checklist to ensure the safety of all those involved. All participants in official Scouting America activities should become familiar with the Guide to Safe Scouting and applicable program literature or manuals.

requirements.text: Discover technology around your home, meeting place, or neighborhood.
Discover ways that digital technology can make life easier.

activities.name: Technology Charades
activities.description: A game of charades that  identifies  how technology has made life easier.

activities.name: The Way It Was
activities.description: Tiger adult partners share what life was like before modern technology.

requirements.text: With your parent or legal guardian, set up a policy for digital devices.

activities.name: Smart and Safe with Technology
